reason.tex:
%text If $f(x) = \sin^{-1} \left(\cos x \right)$, then note that % \begin{align}
f(x) &= \underbrace{\sin^{-1} \left[\sin \left(\frac\pi{2}-x \right) \right] = \frac\pi{2}- x}_{\sin^{-1} \left(\sin\theta \right) = \theta} \\ \therefore \ddx f(x) &= \ddx \left(\frac\pi{2}-x \right) = -1 \end{align} %text %
